subject: ANN: New moderators
msgSnippet: I am happy to announce five new moderators: Simon Chappell Dianne Doss Shane Mingins Mark Salter Joe Schmetzer To encourage consistency on the list, I would
messageBody:
I am happy to announce five new moderators:

Simon Chappell
Dianne Doss
Shane Mingins
Mark Salter
Joe Schmetzer

To encourage consistency on the list, I would like to describe what
messages I have been allowing and not allowing.

1. All job offer messages from recruiters are rejected and their posters
are banned. (Job offers from known members of the group are usually
allowed, but those are rare.)

2. Individuals on moderation remain on moderation until they write a few
messages that show they are contributing or asking useful questions.

3. RTFM questions should be rejected with a polite version of RTFM.

Aside from that, use your common sense.

Thanks for the help. Start approving messages!
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
Your guide to software craftsmanship
JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
